metadata.Title: CVE-2015-2266 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
message/index.php in Moodle through 2.5.9, 2.6.x before 2.6.9, 2.7.x before2.7.6, and 2.8.x before 2.8.4 does not consider themoodle/site:readallmessages capability before accessing arbitraryconversations, which allows remote authenticated users to obtain sensitivepersonal-contact and unread-message-count information via a modified URL.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-2266` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

moodle - 3.0.3+dfsg-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: moodle package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.3+dfsg-0ubuntu1').
